I just downloaded this and wanted to give a comparison to the version I purchased on itunes.  You may be wondering why I would download it from here if I have a purchased copy - I wanted a copy I could actually take with me to people's houses and also I cannot stand being forced to play it in quicktime thanks to itunes.  Also, I purchased the HD version but quicktime is too shitty to play it on my computer, even though vlc plays other HD videos no problem.  The SD version they included however does play on my computer and I can say even that definitely looks MUCH better than this rip.  The SD version I have is I believe 1.4gb while this is not even 1gb.  This rip is watchable but I definitely suggest you watch a better quality version if at all possible.  I personally cannot wait to get my hands on the HD copy and wish someone would put it up here, I can't help but wonder why the dude who posted it didn't do that to begin with.
